A weekend full of adventure in the wilderness starts with the durable Yura Moc Toe from ECCO(R).
TPU toe cap and mudguard provide an athletic fit and true outdoor feel.
Lightly padded stretch fabric at instep for a comfortable fit.
Pull-loop at heel for easier on.
New RECEPTOR LITE(R) Technology reduces weight while providing dynamic support from the ground impact to the toe off.
Direct-injected PU midsole foam and roomy BIOM last provide long lasting cushioning and outstanding hiking comfort.
Tough and durable rubber outsole with a versatile hiking profile, climbing zone and a defined step for outstanding traction.

Propel yourself to a bright and shiny, new PR in the Brooks(R) Neuro running shoe!
This brand is a member of the Sustainable Apparel Coalition.
Breathable mesh and synthetic uppers manage moisture to keep feet feeling cooler and drier.
Dynamic Hammock System wraps from under the foot, and tightens through the eyelets for a glove-like fit, better foot alignment, and optimal energy return.
Thin comfort tongue and lightly padded collar.
Propulsion Plate provides a stable foundation for a strong toe-off.
Gearing Mechanism allows the forefoot and heel to move independently from one another for power at the push-off phase.
Propulsion Pods and BioMoGo DNA are encapsulated into blown rubber for adaptive cushioning and dynamic energy return.
Dual Toe Flex engages the foot's natural mechanics for a more efficient toe-off.
